name: Federation of Hellenic Associations of Young Entrepreneurs
membership: Member of the European Confederation of Young Entrepreneurs - YES and also Host organisation of the Global Entrepreneurship Network. Member of the STARTUP Nations network.
goal:
To represent and connect young entrepreneurs of Greece at National, European and Global level. The Federation of Hellenic Associations of Young Entrepreneurs is the first organisation for young entrepreneurs in Greece. Supports the networking of young innovative entrepreneurs at National, European and Global level. OESYNE is also involved in the production of strong policy proposals for the improvement of the entrepreneurial ecosystem in Greece.
OESYNE has 7 active regional associations of young entrepreneurs as members.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Culture, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: The main EU policy that our organisation is following is the Innovation Dipole Entrepreneurial Assessment - iDea Framework for supporting the pre seed financing of innovative businesses ideas. In addition OESYNE supports and uses Erasmus for Young Entrepreneurs programme and open innovation for SME's.
